game.name: Func Key
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Deck out your keyboard with powerful upgrades in this roguelike word-builder. Snap on keycaps to buff entire rows or columns, install "broken" function keys, and pick your projects as you rise from a lowly intern to a corporate legend.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Deck out your keyboard with powerful upgrades in this roguelike word-builder. Snap on keycaps to buff entire rows or columns, install "broken" function keys, and pick your projects as you rise from a lowly intern to a corporate legend.
